name: Simple Shmup Defender
description:
First posted game!  Left/Right arrow keys to move.  Space bar to shoot.

Formation moves as a whole block.  New ships animate into their position while the position is moving.  Enemy re-spawning starts when the whole formation is destroyed, and it will not stop until it has filled the formation (never let it fill up to get highest score per second).

Player movement is based on physics to add challenge.
